wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Goldie (born 14 December 1923) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, Raith Rovers, Ayr United and Albion Rovers.

response: Hugh Goldie (1919–2010) was an English theatre director.
Hugh Goldie may also refer to:
*Hugh Goldie (footballer, born 1874), Scottish footballer active at the turn of the 20th century
*Hugh Goldie (footballer, born 1923), Scottish footballer active in the 1950s
